message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is depreciation.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see there is a line item labeled "Depreciation" with an amount of 91509.25 on 2024-02-05.

Depreciation represents the systematic allocation of the cost of tangible assets over their useful lives, which matches exactly what the task is asking for.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '91509.25'} }
```
